plot: A short documentary about the improved conditions in small villages in Ghana and Burkina Faso. Lots of progress has been made but there is a lot more work to do in these remote villages that do not have running water or electricity.
title: Amurt Ghana/Burkina Faso
plot_es: A short documentary about the improved conditions in small villages in Ghana and Burkina Faso. Lots of progress has been made but there is a lot more work to do in these remote villages that do not have running water or electricity.
